Quote.Author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Opportunity dances with those already on the dance floor

Quote.Author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Enjoy the satisfaction that comes from doing little things well

Quote.Author: H. L. Mencken
Quote.QuoteValue: Democracy is the art and science of running the circus from the monkey cage

Quote.Author: H. L. Mencken
Quote.QuoteValue: For every complex problem there is an answer that is clear, simple, and wrong

Quote.Author: H. L. Mencken
Quote.QuoteValue: Democracy is a pathetic belief in the collective wisdom of individual ignorance

Quote.Author: H. L. Mencken
Quote.QuoteValue: A judge is a law student who marks his own examination papers

Quote.Author: H. L. Mencken
Quote.QuoteValue: Puritanism. The haunting fear that someone, somewhere, may be happy

Quote.Author: H. L. Mencken
Quote.QuoteValue: A man may be a fool and not know it, but not if he is married

Quote.Author: H. L. Mencken
Quote.QuoteValue: Honor is simply the morality of superior men

Quote.Author: H. L. Mencken
Quote.QuoteValue: Communism, like any other revealed religion, is largely made up of prophecies

Quote.Author: H. L. Mencken
Quote.QuoteValue: The urge to save humanity is almost always a false front for the urge to rule

Quote.Author: H. L. Mencken
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is the delusion that one woman differs from another

Quote.Author: H. P. Lovecraft
Quote.QuoteValue: Unhappy is he to whom the memories of childhood bring only fear and sadness

Quote.Author: H. P. Lovecraft
Quote.QuoteValue: Ocean is more ancient than the mountains, and freighted with the memories and the dreams of Time

Quote.Author: H. P. Lovecraft
Quote.QuoteValue: The process of delving into the black abyss is to me the keenest form of fascination

Quote.Author: H. P. Lovecraft
Quote.QuoteValue: But more wonderful than the lore of old men and the lore of books is the secret lore of ocean

Quote.Author: H. P. Lovecraft
Quote.QuoteValue: Toil without song is like a weary journey without an end

Quote.Author: H. P. Lovecraft
Quote.QuoteValue: Searchers after horror haunt strange, far places

Quote.Author: H. P. Lovecraft
Quote.QuoteValue: I could not write about 'ordinary people' because I am not in the least interested in them

Quote.Author: H. P. Lovecraft
Quote.QuoteValue: But are not the dreams of poets and the tales of travellers notoriously false?

Quote.Author: H. P. Lovecraft
Quote.QuoteValue: I fear my enthusiasm flags when real work is demanded of me

Quote.Author: H. P. Lovecraft
Quote.QuoteValue: The world is indeed comic, but the joke is on mankind

Quote.Author: Hannah Arendt
Quote.QuoteValue: The most radical revolutionary will become a conservative the day after the revolution

Quote.Author: Hannah Arendt
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing we use or hear or touch can be expressed in words that equal what is given by the senses

Quote.Author: Hannah Arendt
Quote.QuoteValue: There are no dangerous thoughts; thinking itself is dangerous

Quote.Author: Hannah Arendt
Quote.QuoteValue: Storytelling reveals meaning without committing the error of defining it

Quote.Author: Hannah Arendt
Quote.QuoteValue: For the things we have to learn before we can do them, we learn by doing them

Quote.Author: Hannah Arendt
Quote.QuoteValue: The sad truth is that most evil is done by people who never make up their minds to be good or evil

Quote.Author: Hannah Arendt
Quote.QuoteValue: In order to go on living one must try to escape the death involved in perfectionism

Quote.Author: Hannah Arendt
Quote.QuoteValue: The Third World is not a reality but an ideology

Quote.Author: Hannah Arendt
Quote.QuoteValue: Forgiveness is the key to action and freedom

Quote.Author: Hannah Arendt
Quote.QuoteValue: Few girls are as well shaped as a good horse

Quote.Author: Harry S Truman
Quote.QuoteValue: It is amazing what you can accomplish if you do not care who gets the credit

Quote.Author: Harry S Truman
Quote.QuoteValue: There is nothing new in the world except the history you do not know

Quote.Author: Harry S Truman
Quote.QuoteValue: If you can't stand the heat, get out of the kitchen

Quote.Author: Harry S Truman
Quote.QuoteValue: Actions are the seed of fate deeds grow into destiny

Quote.Author: Harry S Truman
Quote.QuoteValue: The reward of suffering is experience

Quote.Author: Harry S Truman
Quote.QuoteValue: If I'd known how much packing I'd have to do, I'd have run again

Quote.Author: Harry S Truman
Quote.QuoteValue: If you can't convince them, confuse them

Quote.Author: Harry S Truman
Quote.QuoteValue: I never did give anybody hell. I just told the truth and they thought it was hell

Quote.Author: Harry S Truman
Quote.QuoteValue: A leader in the Democratic Party is a boss, in the Republican Party he is a leader

Quote.Author: Harry S Truman
Quote.QuoteValue: The White House is the finest prison in the world

Quote.Author: Helen Keller
Quote.QuoteValue: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence

Quote.Author: Helen Keller
Quote.QuoteValue: Walking with a friend in the dark is better than walking alone in the light

Quote.Author: Helen Keller
Quote.QuoteValue: Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see a shadow

Quote.Author: Helen Keller
Quote.QuoteValue: So long as the memory of certain beloved friends lives in my heart, I shall say that life is good

Quote.Author: Helen Keller
Quote.QuoteValue: Never bend your head. Always hold it high. Look the world straight in the eye

Quote.Author: Helen Keller
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is either a great adventure or nothing

Quote.Author: Helen Keller
Quote.QuoteValue: Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much

Quote.Author: Helen Keller
Quote.QuoteValue: The only thing worse than being blind is having sight but no vision

Quote.Author: Helen Keller
Quote.QuoteValue: The highest result of education is tolerance

Quote.Author: Helen Keller
Quote.QuoteValue: We could never learn to be brave and patient, if there were only joy in the world

Quote.Author: Helen Mirren
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no good way to waste your time. Wasting time is just wasting time

Quote.Author: Helen Mirren
Quote.QuoteValue: Gardening is learning, learning, learning. That's the fun of them. You're always learning

Quote.Author: Helen Mirren
Quote.QuoteValue: We're all idiots when we're young. We don't think we are, but we are. So we should be

Quote.Author: Helen Mirren
Quote.QuoteValue: Flesh sells. People don't want to see pictures of churches. They want to see naked bodies

Quote.Author: Helen Mirren
Quote.QuoteValue: The trick in life is learning how to deal with it

Quote.Author: Helen Mirren
Quote.QuoteValue: It's great to be queen!

Quote.Author: Helen Mirren
Quote.QuoteValue: I was never that kind of star. I was never cast because I was gorgeous

Quote.Author: Helen Mirren
Quote.QuoteValue: I love photography, and I love the art of photography

Quote.Author: Helen Mirren
Quote.QuoteValue: The great marriages are partnerships. It can't be a great marriage without being a partnership

Quote.Author: Helen Mirren
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not strong-willed, actually. I'm a complete pushover. I love to be told what to do

Quote.Author: Henry David Thoreau
Quote.QuoteValue: The language of friendship is not words but meanings

Quote.Author: Henry David Thoreau
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not what you look at that matters, it's what you see

Quote.Author: Henry David Thoreau
Quote.QuoteValue: Friends... they cherish one another's hopes. They are kind to one another's dreams

Quote.Author: Henry David Thoreau
Quote.QuoteValue: This world is but a canvas to our imagination

Quote.Author: Henry David Thoreau
Quote.QuoteValue: An early-morning walk is a blessing for the whole day

Quote.Author: Henry David Thoreau
Quote.QuoteValue: Many men go fishing all of their lives without knowing that it is not fish they are after

Quote.Author: Henry David Thoreau
Quote.QuoteValue: Not until we are lost do we begin to understand ourselves

Quote.Author: Henry David Thoreau
Quote.QuoteValue: You must live in the present, launch yourself on every wave, find your eternity in each moment

Quote.Author: Henry David Thoreau
Quote.QuoteValue: It is not enough to be busy. So are the ants. The question is: What are we busy about?

Quote.Author: Henry David Thoreau
Quote.QuoteValue: True friendship can afford true knowledge. It does not depend on darkness and ignorance

Quote.Author: Henry Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: My best friend is the one who brings out the best in me

Quote.Author: Henry Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: Coming together is a beginning; keeping together is progress; working together is success

Quote.Author: Henry Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently

Quote.Author: Henry Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: Obstacles are those frightful things you see when you take your eyes off your goal

Quote.Author: Henry Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't find fault, find a remedy

Quote.Author: Henry Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: If everyone is moving forward together, then success takes care of itself

Quote.Author: Henry Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: A business that makes nothing but money is a poor business

Quote.Author: Henry Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: Quality means doing it right when no one is looking

Quote.Author: Henry Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: Thinking is the hardest work there is, which is probably the reason why so few engage in it

Quote.Author: Henry Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: If you think you can do a thing or think you can't do a thing, you're right

Quote.Author: Henry Rollins
Quote.QuoteValue: Loneliness adds beauty to life. It puts a special burn on sunsets and makes night air smell better

Quote.Author: Henry Rollins
Quote.QuoteValue: Pizza makes me think that anything is possible

Quote.Author: Henry Rollins
Quote.QuoteValue: My motto is, 'Never quit.'

Quote.Author: Henry Rollins
Quote.QuoteValue: Life will not break your heart. It'll crush it

Quote.Author: Henry Rollins
Quote.QuoteValue: August, the summer's last messenger of misery, is a hollow actor

Quote.Author: Henry Rollins
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to pass through life like a smooth plane ride

Quote.Author: Henry Rollins
Quote.QuoteValue: My optimism wears heavy boots and is loud

Quote.Author: Henry Rollins
Quote.QuoteValue: I am on until I am dead, like a light bulb

Quote.Author: Henry Rollins
Quote.QuoteValue: You need a little bit of insanity to do great things

Quote.Author: Henry Rollins
Quote.QuoteValue: In winter, I plot and plan. In spring, I move

Quote.Author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow
Quote.QuoteValue: The best thing one can do when it's raining is to let it rain

Quote.Author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow
Quote.QuoteValue: In character, in manner, in style, in all things, the supreme excellence is simplicity

Quote.Author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow
Quote.QuoteValue: Into each life some rain must fall

Quote.Author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow
Quote.QuoteValue: Music is the universal language of mankind

Quote.Author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow
Quote.QuoteValue: The love of learning, the sequestered nooks, And all the sweet serenity of books

Quote.Author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow
Quote.QuoteValue: Simplicity in character, in manners, in style; in all things the supreme excellence is simplicity

Quote.Author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow
Quote.QuoteValue: Thy fate is the common fate of all; Into each life some rain must fall

Quote.Author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow
Quote.QuoteValue: That which the fountain sends forth returns again to the fountain

Quote.Author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow
Quote.QuoteValue: A thought often makes us hotter than a fire

Quote.Author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow
Quote.QuoteValue: The human voice is the organ of the soul

Quote.Author: Hilaire Belloc
Quote.QuoteValue: Loss and possession, death and life are one, There falls no shadow where there shines no sun

Quote.Author: Hilaire Belloc
Quote.QuoteValue: Be content to remember that those who can make omelettes properly can do nothing else

Quote.Author: Hilaire Belloc
Quote.QuoteValue: The grace of God is courtesy

Quote.Author: Hilaire Belloc
Quote.QuoteValue: When I am dead, I hope it may be said: His sins were scarlet, but his books were read

Quote.Author: Hilaire Belloc
Quote.QuoteValue: All men have an instinct for conflict: at least, all healthy men

Quote.Author: Hilaire Belloc
Quote.QuoteValue: It is sometimes necessary to lie damnably in the interests of the nation

Quote.Author: Hilaire Belloc
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm tired of love; I'm still more tired of rhyme; but money gives me pleasure all the time

Quote.Author: Hilaire Belloc
Quote.QuoteValue: Just as there is nothing between the admirable omelet and the intolerable, so with autobiography

Quote.Author: Hilaire Belloc
Quote.QuoteValue: I am writing a book about the Crusades so dull that I can scarcely write it

Quote.Author: Hilaire Belloc
Quote.QuoteValue: It is the best of all trades, to make songs, and the second best to sing them

Quote.Author: Hillary Clinton
Quote.QuoteValue: Women are the largest untapped reservoir of talent in the world

Quote.Author: Hillary Clinton
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't walk away if you love someone. You help the person

Quote.Author: Hillary Clinton
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe that the rights of women and girls is the unfinished business of the 21st century

Quote.Author: Hillary Clinton
Quote.QuoteValue: Probably my worst quality is that I get very passionate about what I think is right

Quote.Author: Hillary Clinton
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to be true to yourself

Quote.Author: Hillary Clinton
Quote.QuoteValue: I've had extraordinary good luck with my health, other than a broken elbow

Quote.Author: Hillary Clinton
Quote.QuoteValue: If I want to knock a story off the front page, I just change my hairstyle

Quote.Author: Hillary Clinton
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a difference between fair game and playing games

Quote.Author: Hillary Clinton
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm undaunted in my quest to amuse myself by constantly changing my hair

Quote.Author: Hillary Clinton
Quote.QuoteValue: I suppose I could have stayed home and baked cookies and had teas

Quote.Author: Hunter S. Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: Some may never live, but the crazy never die

Quote.Author: Hunter S. Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: When the going gets weird, the weird turn pro

Quote.Author: Hunter S. Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: Freedom is something that dies unless it's used

Quote.Author: Hunter S. Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no such thing as paranoia. Your worst fears can come true at any moment

Quote.Author: Hunter S. Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: The world is still a weird place, despite my efforts to make clear and perfect sense of it

Quote.Author: Hunter S. Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: Buy the ticket, take the ride

Quote.Author: Hunter S. Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: Yesterday's weirdness is tomorrow's reason why

Quote.Author: Hunter S. Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: As long as I'm learning something, I figure I'm OK - it's a decent day

Quote.Author: Hunter S. Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: For every moment of triumph, for every instance of beauty, many souls must be trampled

Quote.Author: Hunter S. Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: In my heart, I am always a Raider

Quote.Author: Ian Anderson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm very much an observer and a conduit of thoughts and ideas

Quote.Author: Ian Anderson
Quote.QuoteValue: I can never make up my mind if I'm happy being a flute player, or if I wish I were Eric Clapton

Quote.Author: Ian Anderson
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of pop music is about stealing pocket money from children

Quote.Author: Ian Anderson
Quote.QuoteValue: It's only the giving that makes you what you are

Quote.Author: Ian Anderson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm really terrible with small children; they're small, noisy, irritating, damp and soggy

Quote.Author: Ian Anderson
Quote.QuoteValue: Seek that which within lies waiting to begin the fight of your life that is everyday

Quote.Author: Ian Anderson
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always been fond of acoustic music

Quote.Author: Ian Anderson
Quote.QuoteValue: Touring is what you make it. I like to organise as much as possible myself

Quote.Author: Ian Anderson
Quote.QuoteValue: Our politicians may fail us, but Status Quo always delivers on the promise

Quote.Author: Ian Anderson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not one for Sudoku or crosswords - the thing that fires my little brain is doing tour budgets

Quote.Author: Ice Cube
Quote.QuoteValue: I think, to me, reality is better than being fake

Quote.Author: Ice Cube
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't worry about being a star, worry about doing good work, and all that will come to you

Quote.Author: Ice Cube
Quote.QuoteValue: I love music. It's freedom, a way to deal with pent-up frustration

Quote.Author: Ice Cube
Quote.QuoteValue: Truth is the ultimate power. When the truth comes around, all the lies have to run and hide

Quote.Author: Ice Cube
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the worst thing you can do about a situation is nothing

Quote.Author: Ice Cube
Quote.QuoteValue: If you think about stuff that happened when you were young, it stays with you forever

Quote.Author: Ice Cube
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I'm unique to the game 'cause of my versatility

Quote.Author: Ice Cube
Quote.QuoteValue: South Central is just who I am

Quote.Author: Ice Cube
Quote.QuoteValue: Sports without music, it's nothing but a game. Music adds the emotion

Quote.Author: Ice Cube
Quote.QuoteValue: Doing it your own way, not having to go exactly by the book to be successful

Quote.Author: Ice T
Quote.QuoteValue: A good emcee will rhyme a lot of different ways. Don't limit yourself

Quote.Author: Ice T
Quote.QuoteValue: If somebody wants to kill people, they don't need a gun to do it

Quote.Author: Ice T
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't come out on a record dissing the system and be on a label that's connected to the system

Quote.Author: Ice T
Quote.QuoteValue: Ultimately I am happy that everybody is embracing hip hop and the sounds from the streets

Quote.Author: Ice T
Quote.QuoteValue: I make an effort to keep it as real as I possibly can

Quote.Author: Ice T
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a big fan of all styles, even Biggie and Wu-Tang, but I gotta do my thing

Quote.Author: Ice T
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never been competitive with anybody but myself

Quote.Author: Ice T
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't have to put out another rap record. I can do it at my casual pace

Quote.Author: Ice T
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're really a rapper, you can't stop rapping

Quote.Author: Ice T
Quote.QuoteValue: When you start a business, go for the lowest hanging fruit

Quote.Author: Igor Stravinsky
Quote.QuoteValue: My music is best understood by children and animals

Quote.Author: Igor Stravinsky
Quote.QuoteValue: Harpists spend 90 percent of their lives tuning their harps and 10 percent playing out of tune

Quote.Author: Igor Stravinsky
Quote.QuoteValue: Lesser artists borrow, great artists steal

Quote.Author: Igor Stravinsky
Quote.QuoteValue: Is it not by love alone that we succeed in penetrating to the very essence of being?

Quote.Author: Igor Stravinsky
Quote.QuoteValue: What gives the artist real prestige is his imitators

Quote.Author: Igor Stravinsky
Quote.QuoteValue: Sins cannot be undone, only forgiven

Quote.Author: Igor Stravinsky
Quote.QuoteValue: In order to create there must be a dynamic force, and what force is more potent than love?

Quote.Author: Igor Stravinsky
Quote.QuoteValue: I haven't understood a bar of music in my life, but I have felt it

Quote.Author: Igor Stravinsky
Quote.QuoteValue: Too many pieces of music finish too long after the end

Quote.Author: Igor Stravinsky
Quote.QuoteValue: To listen is an effort, and just to hear is no merit. A duck hears also

Quote.Author: Imelda Marcos
Quote.QuoteValue: I did not have three thousand pairs of shoes, I had one thousand and sixty

Quote.Author: Imelda Marcos
Quote.QuoteValue: Doesn't the fight for survival also justify swindle and theft? In self defence, anything goes

Quote.Author: Imelda Marcos
Quote.QuoteValue: Win or lose, we go shopping after the election

Quote.Author: Imelda Marcos
Quote.QuoteValue: I love everybody. One of the great things about me is that I have a very positive attitude

Quote.Author: Imelda Marcos
Quote.QuoteValue: If you know how much you've got, you probably haven't got much

Quote.Author: Imelda Marcos
Quote.QuoteValue: God is love. I have loved. Therefore, I will go to heaven

Quote.Author: Imelda Marcos
Quote.QuoteValue: I hate ugliness. You know I'm allergic to ugliness

Quote.Author: Imelda Marcos
Quote.QuoteValue: It's the rich you can terrorize. The poor have nothing to lose

Quote.Author: Imelda Marcos
Quote.QuoteValue: We practically own everything in the Philippines

Quote.Author: Imelda Marcos
Quote.QuoteValue: I was no Marie Antoinette. I was not born to nobility, but I had a human right to nobility

Quote.Author: Immanuel Kant
Quote.QuoteValue: Science is organized knowledge. Wisdom is organized life

Quote.Author: Immanuel Kant
Quote.QuoteValue: Two things awe me most, the starry sky above me and the moral law within me

Quote.Author: Immanuel Kant
Quote.QuoteValue: Live your life as though your every act were to become a universal law

Quote.Author: Immanuel Kant
Quote.QuoteValue: Thoughts without content are empty, intuitions without concepts are blind

Quote.Author: Immanuel Kant
Quote.QuoteValue: May you live your life as if the maxim of your actions were to become universal law

Quote.Author: Immanuel Kant
Quote.QuoteValue: To be is to do

Quote.Author: Immanuel Kant
Quote.QuoteValue: If man makes himself a worm he must not complain when he is trodden on

Quote.Author: Immanuel Kant
Quote.QuoteValue: It is beyond a doubt that all our knowledge begins with experience

Quote.Author: Immanuel Kant
Quote.QuoteValue: Out of timber so crooked as that from which man is made nothing entirely straight can be carved

Quote.Author: Immanuel Kant
Quote.QuoteValue: It is not God's will merely that we should be happy, but that we should make ourselves happy

Quote.Author: Indira Gandhi
Quote.QuoteValue: People tend to forget their duties but remember their rights

Quote.Author: Indira Gandhi
Quote.QuoteValue: You must learn to be still in the midst of activity and to be vibrantly alive in repose

Quote.Author: Indira Gandhi
Quote.QuoteValue: Martyrdom does not end something, it only a beginning

Quote.Author: Indira Gandhi
Quote.QuoteValue: All my games were political games; I was, like Joan of Arc, perpetually being burned at the stake

Quote.Author: Indira Gandhi
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not a person to be pressured - by anybody or any nation

Quote.Author: Indira Gandhi
Quote.QuoteValue: The power to question is the basis of all human progress

Quote.Author: Indira Gandhi
Quote.QuoteValue: You cannot shake hands with a clenched fist

Quote.Author: Indira Gandhi
Quote.QuoteValue: Forgiveness is a virtue of the brave

Quote.Author: Indira Gandhi
Quote.QuoteValue: There is not love where there is no will

Quote.Author: Indira Gandhi
Quote.QuoteValue: The collective judgment of the electorate must be respected

Quote.Author: Ira Glass
Quote.QuoteValue: In most daily journalism, you only fact-check something if it seems a little fishy

Quote.Author: Ira Glass
Quote.QuoteValue: The flakier your mission, the fiercer you have to be on the business side

Quote.Author: Ira Glass
Quote.QuoteValue: I suppose I shouldn't go around admitting I speak untruths on the radio

Quote.Author: Ira Glass
Quote.QuoteValue: I think stories get better the more people try to amuse themselves

Quote.Author: Ira Glass
Quote.QuoteValue: I am mostly a pretty worried person. In conversations, I am always worried about what to say

Quote.Author: Ira Glass
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a pit bull. He's a rescue. He's adorable

Quote.Author: Ira Glass
Quote.QuoteValue: Just when did I get to the point when staying at a hotel wasn't fun?

Quote.Author: Ira Glass
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't take care of my voice at all, which is one reason that I sound as bad as I do

Quote.Author: Ira Glass
Quote.QuoteValue: I just have a harder time, I think, feeling close to people without self consciousness

Quote.Author: Ira Glass
Quote.QuoteValue: I have been shocked at the number of people who don't watch television

Quote.Author: Isaac Asimov
Quote.QuoteValue: People who think they know everything are a great annoyance to those of us who do

Quote.Author: Isaac Asimov
Quote.QuoteValue: Writing, to me, is simply thinking through my fingers

Quote.Author: Isaac Asimov
Quote.QuoteValue: I do not fear computers. I fear the lack of them

Quote.Author: Isaac Asimov
Quote.QuoteValue: The true delight is in the finding out rather than in the knowing

Quote.Author: Isaac Asimov
Quote.QuoteValue: Never let your sense of morals get in the way of doing what's right

Quote.Author: Isaac Asimov
Quote.QuoteValue: Violence is the last refuge of the incompetent

Quote.Author: Isaac Asimov
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is pleasant. Death is peaceful. It's the transition that's troublesome

Quote.Author: Isaac Asimov
Quote.QuoteValue: If knowledge can create problems, it is not through ignorance that we can solve them

Quote.Author: Isaac Asimov
Quote.QuoteValue: Self-education is, I firmly believe, the only kind of education there is

Quote.Author: Isaac Asimov
Quote.QuoteValue: There is a single light of science, and to brighten it anywhere is to brighten it everywhere

Quote.Author: Isaac Newton
Quote.QuoteValue: We build too many walls and not enough bridges

Quote.Author: Isaac Newton
Quote.QuoteValue: Truth is ever to be found in simplicity, and not in the multiplicity and confusion of things

Quote.Author: Isaac Newton
Quote.QuoteValue: If I have seen further than others, it is by standing upon the shoulders of giants

Quote.Author: Isaac Newton
Quote.QuoteValue: To every action there is always opposed an equal reaction

Quote.Author: Isaac Newton
Quote.QuoteValue: My powers are ordinary. Only my application brings me success

Quote.Author: Isaac Newton
Quote.QuoteValue: I can calculate the motion of heavenly bodies, but not the madness of people

Quote.Author: Isaac Newton
Quote.QuoteValue: In the absence of any other proof, the thumb alone would convince me of God's existence

Quote.Author: Isaac Newton
Quote.QuoteValue: Errors are not in the art but in the artificers

Quote.Author: Isaac Newton
Quote.QuoteValue: It is the weight, not numbers of experiments that is to be regarded

Quote.Author: Isaac Newton
Quote.QuoteValue: Tact is the art of making a point without making an enemy

Quote.Author: Isabel Allende
Quote.QuoteValue: My life is about ups and downs, great joys and great losses

Quote.Author: Isabel Allende
Quote.QuoteValue: What I fear most is power with impunity. I fear abuse of power, and the power to abuse

Quote.Author: Isabel Allende
Quote.QuoteValue: I tend to see the similarities in people and not the differences

Quote.Author: Isabel Allende
Quote.QuoteValue: Roots are not in landscape or a country, or a people, they are inside you

Quote.Author: Isabel Allende
Quote.QuoteValue: Heart is what drives us and determines our fate

Quote.Author: Isabel Allende
Quote.QuoteValue: I have learned many things in the 30 years that I have been writing

Quote.Author: Isabel Allende
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want an uneventful and safe life, I prefer an adventurous one

Quote.Author: Isabel Allende
Quote.QuoteValue: I was a lousy journalist. I could never be objective. Sometimes I invented the whole story

Quote.Author: Isabel Allende
Quote.QuoteValue: If I didn't write my soul would dry up and die

Quote.Author: Isabel Allende
Quote.QuoteValue: My writing comes not from the happy moments, but from struggle and grief

Quote.Author: Ivanka Trump
Quote.QuoteValue: Real estate is my life. It is my day job, if you will. But it consumes my nights and weekends, too

Quote.Author: Ivanka Trump
Quote.QuoteValue: If people think they can elicit from me whatever terms they want, they are mistaken

Quote.Author: Ivanka Trump
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything about mediocrity kills me

Quote.Author: Ivanka Trump
Quote.QuoteValue: I hate having people sit in on meetings

Quote.Author: Ivanka Trump
Quote.QuoteValue: If people think I'm just the boss's daughter, they're deceived

Quote.Author: Ivanka Trump
Quote.QuoteValue: I think my mom threatened to put me up for adoption a few times

Quote.Author: Ivanka Trump
Quote.QuoteValue: Modeling was not an endgame for me. I didn't particularly enjoy the act of it

Quote.Author: Ivanka Trump
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a clone, and I'm not a minion
